KorText: 골목 구석 노란 지붕 집에는 한 아이가 살았어.
EngText: In a house at the far end of the road, there lived a boy.

KorText: 항상 가슴을 움켜쥐며 침을 삼키고, 눈을 도르륵도르륵 굴리던 아이가.
EngText: The boy grasped at his chest and swallowed, rolling his eyes this way and that.

KorText: 그 아이의 식도 안에는 그의 쌍둥이 형이 살았어.
EngText: In his esophagus lived his twin brother.

KorText: 어머니의 뱃속에서 함께 자라나다 죽어 버린 형이.
EngText: The brother that died while growing inside their mother.

KorText: 아이와 닮은 눈을 도록도록 굴리며 식도 안에 살았어.
EngText: He lived inside his brother, with eyes just like him that rolled this way and that.

KorText: 아마도 형은, 아이의 일곱 번째 생일날, 그들의 할머니가 한숨처럼 뱉은 말을 먹고 태어났을 거야.
EngText: The twin was born from their grandma’s words, spat out on the child’s seventh birthday.
“Ate a human when he was born, that one did.”
“His own brother at that…”

KorText: 그 말은 아이의 연약한 가슴을 움켜쥐었을 거야. 너무 세게 움켜쥔 나머지,
EngText: The words seized his heart. Seized it with such a grip.

KorText: 그 기이하고 퍽퍽한 믿음은 아이의 가슴을 꿰뚫고 뿌리 내렸을 거야.
EngText: That strange dry belief pierced through the child’s heart and laid roots.
It branched out within,
grew a single fruit,
opened its eyes,
and became “the brother”.

KorText: 오래오래 소화되지 않을, 아이와 똑 닮은, 형의 추하고 귀여운 얼굴이 되었어.
EngText: A grotesquely adorable face, just like the child’s. One that just wouldn’t be digested.

KorText: 그 이후로 그 아이는 무언가를 자주 삼켰어. 형의 존재를 들킬까 봐 두려웠거든.
EngText: From then on the boy swallowed, in fear others would learn about his brother.
His uncle’s pitying gaze,

KorText: 삼촌의 딱한 눈빛도, 그 눈빛을 보고 튀어나오려던 억울한 비명도,
EngText: and the scream that leapt to his throat.
The fingers his friends pointed at him,
and the protest that leapt to his throat.
The vastest of sorrows, the faintest of cries.
People that would stare and stare and stare.
“Swallow. Swallow. Please. Swallow.”

KorText: 꿀, 꺽 넘어가며 그것들은 싱싱한 토사물로 쌓여 갔지만
EngText: Gulp gulp gulp, stacked one by one as fresh vile vomit,

KorText: 아이는 뱉어 낼 수 없었어. 식도 속 형의 존재를 들킬까 봐 두려웠으니까.
EngText: but he dared not heave. In case they found who lived in his esophagus.
And he wanted to hide him for a long long time.

KorText: 그러던 어느 날, 그 애는 잠들기 전 이를 닦으려다가
EngText: Then one day, just as he was about to brush his teeth before bed,

KorText: 참아 낼 수 없는 답답함에 몸부림치며 가슴을 움켜쥐었어.
EngText: he grasped at his chest and writhed as if he were being suffocated.
And,
But,
Then,
So….
